alert.note: Alert for Caswell; Rockingham (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 10:28PM EST until January 11 at 11:12AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...Virginia... Dan River Near Wentworth affecting Rockingham County. Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia...North Carolina... Dan River near Danville affecting Pittsylvania, Caswell, and Rockingham Counties, as well as the City of Danville. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, STP near Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River near STP near Danville. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Flood water begins to affect the Danville Utilities Complex and the Public Works complex, * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 25.7 feet by early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1030 AM EST.
